game.name: Sheepherds!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 쉬퍼즈! (Sheepherds!) 는 1–4명이 함께 즐길 수 있는 아늑한 협동 파티 게임입니다. 양치기견 친구들과 함께 아름다운 풍경을 달리며 다채로운 양 떼를 이끌고 털을 모아 보세요. 함께 짖고, 달리고, 놀거나 도전을 통해 추가 보상을 획득하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sheepherds! is a cozy co-op party game for 1–4 players, where you and your sheepdog buddies guide colorful flocks through beautiful landscapes to collect their wool. There's no time limit: bark, run, and play together — or take on challenges to win even more rewards!

reviewHighlights.text: A super cute game to play with a partner or friend(s), especially if you're a dog lover! The gameplay has an Overcooked vibe without the added stress...
Cute game that is quite fun. A very good level of challenge for casual gamers. Highly recommend as a great co-op experience.
